scripts.clean: shopt -s globstar && rm -rf polyfill.js node/*.js node/*.capnp* amd/*.js amd/*.capnp*
scripts.cp: cp -t amd *.capnp toCandidate.js polyfill.js & cp -t node *.capnp & wait
scripts.build: (npm run compileMySchema & (npm run polyfill && npm run cp) & wait) && npm run nfy
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
